name: mindshell
title: Foehn Revolt sound pack
author: nacl fish
contact: Please leave a message on the mod platform
description:
Mods that use the BGM of Mental Omega and some of the sounds.
If the author of Mental Omega is dissatisfied with this mod, please let me know and I will delete it.
I like Mental Omega and its sound，but I don't want to make Mentalmeisters angry.
使用Mental Omega的BGM和一些声音的Mod。
如果Mental Omega的作者对这个mod不满意，请告诉我，我会删除它。
我喜欢Mental Omega及其声音，但我不想让Mentalmeisters生气。
